text: Ivan is a 2017 Slovenian drama film directed by Janez Burger. It was selected as the Slovenian entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 91st Academy Awards, but it was not nominated. ==Cast== * Marusa Majer as Mara * Matjaz Tribuson as Rok * Natasa Barbara Gracner as Socialna delavka ==See also== * List of submissions to the 91st Academy Awards for Best Foreign Language Film * List of Slovenian submissions for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:Slovenian films Category:Slovene-language films Category:Italian-language films Category:Slovenian drama films
title: Ivan (2017 film)
